dcterms:description: A dataset containing source code from various projects, used for evaluating comment generation methods.
dcterms:title: Sourcerer repository

dcterms:creator: Alexander LeClair
Siyuan Jiang
Collin McMillan
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the Sourcerer repository, containing Java methods and their corresponding comments, used for training and evaluating neural models for comment generation.
dcterms:title: Standard dataset (derived from Sourcerer repository)

dcterms:creator: Alexander LeClair
Siyuan Jiang
Collin McMillan
dcterms:description: A challenge dataset derived from the Sourcerer repository, designed to evaluate the performance of neural models when only the AST structure is available.
dcterms:title: Challenge dataset (derived from Sourcerer repository)
